title: S15 Ep34: Destination Fear with Dakota and Chelsea Laden
itunes:title: Destination Fear with Dakota and Chelsea Laden
description:
Destination Fear descends on Darkness Radio with guests Dakota & Chelsea Laden.

Brother and sister duo, Dakota Laden and Chelsea Laden join Dave & Tim to discuss some terrifying aspects of their series, favorite haunts, most memorable creepy moments, insights into the new season and more!

Buckle up for another fright-fueled season of Travel Channel’s “Destination Fear” – a haunted road trip turned terrifying sleepover – premiering Wednesday, April 29 at 10 p.m. ET/PT.

For more information visit their site:
https://www.travelchannel.com/shows/destination-fear-2019
